subject: Order #SSN1677
description_text:
I just received my Simsonn Pro X pedals today.  I am missing the VAM pro linear motors that i ordered with pedals. Can you look into this for me?

Thank you,

Britt

conversations.body_text: 你好，Britt Tucker，  第二批电机将于本周六开始到货。 一旦我们从供应商处收到电机铁芯，我们将立即安排快递给您。 送货速度也很快——请放心！
Hi Britt Tucker,    Here's the link to your logistics, which is expected to arrive for you around the 29th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXY1951870173YQ
